summary:
We need to produce JSON with keys: summary, business_intent, keywords (list). Must not list method names verbatim. Focus on class responsibility and state/behavior. Provide English.

We have class RandomGaussianBlur: applies Gaussian blur randomly to tensor images or batch, with per-instance sigma sampled, supports kernel size, sigma range, border type, separable, same_on_batch, probability, keepdim, silence warning. Uses kornia.filters.gaussian_blur2d.

So summary: class that performs stochastic Gaussian blur augmentation on images/tensors, handling single or batch, configurable kernel, sigma range, border handling, separable convolution, batch consistency, probability, output shape.

Business intent: Provide data augmentation for computer vision models, improve robustness/generalization by randomly blurring images during training.

Keywords: Gaussian blur, random augmentation, image preprocessing, tensor, batch processing, kernel size, sigma range, border padding, separable convolution, probability, keep dimensions, kornia, computer vision, data augmentation.

Make sure not to list method names.

Business intent: "Used as a data‑augmentation transform in computer‑vision pipelines to increase model robustness by randomly blurring inputs during training."
